# OptionContext.parse method

```csharp
public static bool parse(IntPtr context, ref int argc, ref IntPtr argv, out IntPtr error)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| context | Transfer ownership: none |
| argc | Transfer ownership: full |
| argv | Transfer ownership: full |
| error | Pointer to an error or IntPtr.Zero |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
